channel.title: A test of your morality and ethics
channel.description:
My friend sent this to me on AIM. I have no idea where he got it.
With all your honour and dignity - what would you do?
This test only has one question, but it's a very important one.
Please don't answer it without giving it some serious thinking. By giving an honest answer you will be able to test
where you stand morally.
The test features an unlikely, completely fictional situation, where you will have to make a decision one way or the
other. Remember that your answer needs to be honest, but spontaneous.
Please scroll down s l o w l y - this is important for the test to work correctly.
You're in Florida.
In Miami, to be exact.
There is huge chaos going on around you, caused by a hurricane and much flooding.
There are masses of water around you.
You are a CNN photographer.
And you are in the midst of this great disaster.
The situation is nearly hopeless.
You're trying to shoot very impressive photos.
There are houses and people floating around you, disappearing into the water masses.
Nature is showing all its destructive power and is ripping everything away with its torrents.
Suddenly you see a man, steering a big van.
He is fighting for his life, trying not to be taken away by the torrents of water and mud.
You move closer.
Somehow the man looks familiar and important...
Suddenly you know who it is - it's George W. Bush!
At the same time you notice that the raging waters are about to take him away, forever.
You have two options. You can save him or you can take the best photo of your life.
So, you can save the life of George W. Bush, or you can shoot a Pulitzer prise winning photo.
A photo displaying the death of a very powerful man.
And here's the question: (Please give an honest answer)
Do you use your camera with the black and white or colour film?
~Ron :eek:

item.title: A test of your morality and ethics
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

I would call up the Iraqes and get them to make 100% sure the jobs been done.

Read full topic

item.title: A test of your morality and ethics
item.dc:creator: @SuperNewb SuperNewb
item.description:
@SuperNewb wrote:

I would shoot with color, so everyone sees his colorful dying self
after he dies, I would laugh
then I would get the photos printed an put in every magazine and newspaper in the world, achieving world peace by getting rid of Bush

[center]no, I am not a bush fan[/center]

Read full topic

I would just point, and laugh.

[/quote]

yea save him and give him punch in the nose… and take a photo of instead you sawing his head off…[/quote]I take it you’re not a fan.
